summary: Frontend exchange rate consistency test completed successfully. Login flow works. All three screens (Dashboard, Recargar con Bolívares, Enviar a Venezuela) correctly display exchange rates from RateContext. Real-time polling (10s interval) verified working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Exchange rate real-time updates working correctly. RateContext fetches from /api/rate every 10 seconds. All screens use useRate() hook from global context.

tests_performed.details: Login with marshalljulio46@gmail.com / Admin2025! works correctly, navigates to Dashboard
Shows '1 RIS = 98.00 VES' in balance card and sidebar widget. Rate from API: ris_to_ves=98.0
Shows '118.00 VES = 1 RIS' (ves_to_ris rate for converting VES to RIS). Sidebar also shows '1 RIS = 98.00 VES'
Shows '1 RIS = 98.00 VES' (ris_to_ves rate for sending RIS). Sidebar also shows same rate.
All screens show the SAME values from RateContext: ris_to_ves=98.0, ves_to_ris=118.0
Console logs confirm '[RateContext] Fetching rate from: /api/rate' every 10 seconds. Rate updates correctly.
